page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Being a rural area few people have found employment in the square studied.Farming and the retail trade are the major employers of labour.Most people have to travel to the nearby town of Bridgwater some three miles away to find work.There are many light engineering works but by far the largest employer is British Cellophane.Others have found work at The Royal Ordinance Works. Those employed outside Bridgwater tend to be working on agricultural produce,cheese,jam,preserves and mushrooms. Local service industry 34% British Cellophane 20% Farm produce 18% Farming 10% Other small industries 10% R.O.F. 8%
